scripts.install: npm run install-app && npm run install-admin
scripts.build: cd feathers-admin && npm run build && cp -r build/* ../feathers-app/public/
scripts.start: npm run build && cd feathers-app && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-local
scripts.test-local: testcafe chrome test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
scripts.test-travis: npm run build && npm run test-saucelabs-chrome && npm run test-saucelabs-ie-11
scripts.test-saucelabs-ie-11: testcafe "saucelabs:Internet Explorer@11.0:Windows 7" test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
scripts.test-saucelabs-ie-10: testcafe "saucelabs:Internet Explorer@10.0:Windows 7" test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
scripts.test-saucelabs-ie-9: testcafe "saucelabs:Internet Explorer@9.0:Windows 7" test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
scripts.test-saucelabs-ie-8: testcafe "saucelabs:Internet Explorer@8.0:Windows 7" test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
